ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 14..
ygData.msgSnippet: So ro is where I went till I hit 15. Killing dervish off the east and west camps there. They both have sentries. So its easy exp. Then at 15 I went to the lake
ygData.messageBody:
So ro is where I went till I hit 15. Killing dervish off the east and west
camps there. They both have sentries. So its easy exp. Then at 15 I went to
the lake and soloed Aviak guards. On a island that is know as the cave
island or the arina is land. There is a little tactic to kill them at level
15 but if you sit in the cave for a bit you will see some one soon enough
doing the hide behind the corner and not get hit while you spell them to
death trick. good luck!

Manick Deathbringer of The Necromancer Enclave

-----Original Message-----
From: johnathan spectre <jspectre@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 05, 1999 8:39 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..


>From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>
>Arrgh.. Does anyone have good suggestions where a 14th level Dark Elf
>Necromancer can go hunting and make some exp (hopefully enough to 16)? I've
>tried east and west commons, most of the things con green to me (90%) and
>don't give exp, the rest just kick my ___. I tried Befallen but all that
>resulted in was a trip back to 13th level twice.
>
>Help?
>
>jspectre @ innoruuk
